description: This table contains information about individual patient insights feedback shared via Payer Platform.

columns.name: FEEDBACK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the Payer Platform feedback record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: INSIGHT_SRC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The insight source type Category ID for the feedback insight.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


CDS Hooks


Care Gap Exchange


Observed Condition

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number of the quality measure outcome record that this feedback applies to, populated if the insight source type is Care Gaps Exchange.

columns.name: CALC_OUTCOME_KEY
columns.description: The unique outcome key that identifies a specific measure outcome the feedback applies to, populated if the insight source type is Care Gaps Exchange.

columns.name: INSIGHT_CODE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The insight code type category ID that the feedback applies to that is stored in column INSIGHT_CODE_VALUE.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Suggestion UUID


ICD10


CPT(R)


CPT(R) II


HCPCS


NDC

columns.name: INSIGHT_CODE_VALUE
columns.description: The code value that served as the source of the insight. This code is of the type stored in column INSIGHT_CODE_TYPE_C.

columns.name: HM_CARE_GAP_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The care gap type category ID for the feedback record, populated if the insight source type is Care Gaps Exchange.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Lipid Panel


Hemogram


ALT Measurement


Creatinine Measurement

Hemoglobin A1C Measurement

Yellow Fever Immunization


Zoster Immunization


Varicella Immunization


Rotavirus Immunization

BMI Screening


Nutrition Counseling

Statin Therapy


Statin Adherence

Antiretroviral Adherence


RAS Antagonist Adherence


Depression Screening


Orthopoxvirus Immunization

columns.name: SHOWN_TO_USER_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the insight was based on data from your organization. If not, either your organization did not provide data for this insight, or your organization's data was not used by the provider organization and another source's data was used instead. 'Y' indicates that this insight data was from your organization, 'N' or NULL indicates it was not.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the provider record that acted on the shared insight. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: PROV_NPI
columns.description: The NPI associated with the provider record that acted on the shared insight.

columns.name: PROV_TAX_IDENT
columns.description: The tax ID associated with the provider record that acted on the shared insight.

columns.name: PROV_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the user who acted on the shared insight is a provider or not. 'Y' indicates the user is a provider. 'N' or NULL indicates the user is not a provider.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SHOWN_TO_USER_YN

columns.name: PCP_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the user who acted on the shared insight is the patient's PCP or not. 'Y' indicates the user is the patient's PCP. 'N' or NULL indicates the user is not the patient's PCP.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SHOWN_TO_USER_YN

columns.name: ACTION_TAKEN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The action taken category ID of the action the user took on the insight.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Accepted


Ignored


Overridden


Deferred

columns.name: ACTION_RESULT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The action result category ID of the subsequent result of the action that was taken on the insight.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Diagnosis Added


Medication Added


Order Added


Order Set Added


Care Plan Added


Resolved


Already On Chart


Patient Refused


Questionnaire Added


Not Applicable


Not Added

columns.name: RESULT_CODE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The result code type category ID of the record added to the patient's chart that is stored in column RESULT_CODE_VALUE.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: INSIGHT_CODE_TYPE_C_NAME

columns.name: RESULT_CODE_VALUE
columns.description: The code value of the record added to patient's chart as the result of the insight action. This code is of the type stored in column RESULT_CODE_TYPE_C.

columns.name: ACTION_COMMENT
columns.description: The free-text comment the user entered as they were taking action on the insight, if entered.

columns.name: ACTION_INSTANT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the user took action on the insight, stored in UTC.

columns.name: SRC_CARE_GAP_PROGRAM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the program record the feedback applies to, populated if the insight source type is Care Gaps Exchange.

columns.name: SRC_CARE_GAP_PROGRAM_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the program record.
